Final Refined Translation: I want to go; I want to do what God is telling me to do next.

Source: Die Fhrer der Kirche sind ehrlich davon berzeugt, dass Sie das Reich Gottes aufbauen knnen wie keine Generation vor Ihnen, sagte er. Wir wissen, dass die Kirche und das Reich Gottes nur weiter aufgerichtet werden und wachsen knnen, wenn Ihre Generation erfolgreich ist.
First English Translation: The leaders of the Church are sincerely convinced that you can build the Kingdom of God like no generation before you, he said. We know that the church and the Kingdom of God can only continue to be established and grow if your generation is successful.
Final Refined Translation: The leaders of the Church are truly convinced that your generation has the unique capacity to build the Kingdom of God like no other generation before you, he stated. We recognize that the Church and the Kingdom of God can only continue to be established and flourish if your generation succeeds.

Final Refined Translation: Only subcategories of your unit that display a green dot can be renamed.

Source: Wir sind nicht hier, um irgendjemanden dazu zu zwingen, den Willen des Vaters im Himmel zu tun. Natrlich hngt das Ma an Freiheit und Verantwortung, das wir unseren Kindern gewhren, von ihrem Alter und ihren Fhigkeiten ab. Wenn wir unseren Kindern helfen, ihre Entscheidungsfreiheit richtig auszuben, wird es leichter sein, sie zu lehren und sie liebzuhaben, ganz unabhngig von ihrem Verhalten.
First English Translation: We are not here to force anyone to do the will of the Father in Heaven. Naturally, the degree of freedom and responsibility we grant our children depends on their age and abilities. When we help our children exercise their freedom of choice properly, it will be easier to teach them and love them, regardless of their behavior.
Final Refined Translation: We are not here to force anyone to do the will of the Father in Heaven. Naturally, the degree of freedom and responsibility we grant our children depends on their age and abilities. By helping our children appropriately exercise their choices, it will become easier to teach and love them, regardless of their behavior.

Source: Das Buch Mormon ist ein weiterer Zeuge fr Jesus Christus und besttigt die Wahrheiten, die in der Bibel stehen.
First English Translation: The Book of Mormon is another witness of Jesus Christ and confirms the truths that are in the Bible.
Final Refined Translation: The Book of Mormon is an additional testament of Jesus Christ and confirms the truths presented in the Bible.

Source: Als die Heiligen der Letzten Tage aus ihren Husern in Nauvoo im Bundesstaat Illinois vertrieben wurden, fanden viele Freude inmitten des Leids.
First English Translation: When the Latter-day Saints were driven from their houses in Nauvoo in the state of Illinois, many found joy amidst the suffering.
Final Refined Translation: When the Latter-day Saints were driven from their homes in Nauvoo, Illinois, many discovered joy even in the midst of suffering.

Source: Wenn man mit der Lge lebt, kann man nie vllig frei sein. Nur jemand, der stndig eine solche Last mit sich herumtrgt oder -getragen hat, kann das nachempfinden. Wir drfen nie vergessen: Etwas Falsches wird nicht dadurch richtig, dass viele es tun. Eine falsche Tat wird auch dadurch nicht richtig, weil sie fr niemanden sichtbar wird.
First English Translation: If one lives with a lie, one can never be completely free. Only someone who constantly carries such a burden or has carried it can understand that. We must never forget: Something wrong does not become right just because many people do it. A wrong act does not become right simply because it is not visible to anyone.
Final Refined Translation: Living with a lie means that one can never be fully free. Only those who constantly carry such a burden or have carried it can truly empathize with this. We must never forget: Something wrong does not become right simply because many people do it. An unjust act also does not become right merely because it is invisible to anyone.

Source: Im Mrz 1944, der Krieg war inzwischen auf seinem Hhepunkt, wurde das Schiff vor Saipan im Sdpazifik angegriffen. Arthur war einer derjenigen an Bord, die auf See verschollen blieben. Der blaue Stern wurde von seinem Ehrenplatz am vorderen Fenster des Hauses der Familie Patton entfernt. An seine Stelle kam ein goldener Stern, der anzeigte, dass derjenige, fr den der blaue Stern gestanden hatte, im Kampf gefallen war. Ein Licht erlosch im Leben von Mrs. Patton.
First English Translation: In March 1944, the war was by now at its peak, the ship was attacked off Saipan in the South Pacific. Arthur was one of those on board who went missing at sea. The blue star was removed from its place of honor at the front window of the Patton family home. In its place, a gold star was put up, indicating that the person for whom the blue star had stood had fallen in battle. A light went out in the life of Mrs. Patton.
Final Refined Translation: In March 1944, at the height of the war, the ship was attacked near Saipan in the South Pacific. Arthur was one of those on board who were lost at sea. The blue star was removed from its place of honor at the front window of the Patton family home. In its place, a gold star was displayed, indicating that the person denoted by the blue star had fallen in battle. A light was extinguished in Mrs. Patton's life.

Source: Und ich erblickte auch einen engen und schmalen Pfad, der an der eisernen Stange entlangfhrte, ja, zu dem Baum, bei dem ich stand;
First English Translation: And I also caught sight of a narrow and slim path that led along the iron rod, indeed, to the tree by which I stood;
Final Refined Translation: And I also noticed a narrow and slender path that ran alongside the iron pole, leading to the tree where I was standing;

Source: Freiwillige helfen auf eigene Gefahr. Jugendliche unter 18 drfen nur teilnehmen, wenn sie von einem Elternteil begleitet werden, oder eine Erlaubnis seitens der Erziehungsberechtigten vorliegt.
First English Translation: Volunteers help at their own risk. Young people under 18 may only participate if they are accompanied by a parent or if there is permission from the legal guardians.
Final Refined Translation: Volunteers participate at their own risk. Youth under the age of 18 may only participate if accompanied by a parent or if they have obtained consent from their legal guardians.

Source: Die scheinbar bersprungenen Leerfelder sind die Felder, die in dem von Ancestry.com generierten Index nicht bercksichtigt wurden. Die Stze mit solchen bersprungenen Feldern enthalten den letzten Index, der ber Ancestry.com erstellt wurde. Darin kommen die neuen Felder, die jetzt indexiert werden mssen, noch nicht vor. Das Projekt ist dadurch wesentlich aufwndiger geworden, sodass mehr Indexierungsarbeit als bei den vorigen US-Volkszhlungsprojekten, an denen sich FamilySearch beteiligt hat, erforderlich ist.
First English Translation: The seemingly skipped empty fields are the fields that were not considered in the index generated by Ancestry.com. The sentences with such skipped fields contain the last index created through Ancestry.com. The new fields that need to be indexed are not yet included. As a result, the project has become significantly more demanding, requiring more indexing work than previous US census projects in which FamilySearch participated.
Final Refined Translation: The seemingly overlooked empty fields are those that were not included in the index generated by Ancestry.com. Sentences containing such overlooked fields feature the latest index created by Ancestry.com; however, the new fields that now need to be indexed are not yet represented. Consequently, the project has become significantly more complex, requiring more indexing effort than the earlier US census projects that FamilySearch participated in.

Source: Entscheidet sich der Schler dafr, mitzuarbeiten, bt er seine Entscheidungsfreiheit aus, und zwar so, dass der Heilige Geist ihm eine Botschaft bermitteln kann, die auf seine individuellen Bedrfnisse zugeschnitten ist. Wenn die Schler zur Mitarbeit angeregt werden, ist es sehr viel wahrscheinlicher, dass der Heilige Geist noch etwas sehr viel Wichtigeres lehrt als das, was Sie vermitteln knnen.
First English Translation: If the student decides to cooperate, he exercises his freedom of choice in such a way that the Holy Spirit can convey a message to him that is tailored to his individual needs. If the students are encouraged to cooperate, it is much more likely that the Holy Spirit will teach something much more important than what you can convey.
Final Refined Translation: When a student decides to participate, he is exercising his freedom of choice in such a way that the Holy Spirit can convey a message tailored to his individual needs. When students are encouraged to engage, it becomes much more likely that the Holy Spirit will teach something far more significant than what you may be able to impart.

Final Refined Translation: Faith as a strengthening force for marriage

Source: Man kann kommerziell abgeflltes Wasser in PET-Behltern kaufen. Nehmen Sie das Mindesthaltbarkeitsdatum der Behlter als Richtwert fr den Verbrauch. Verwenden Sie keine Kunststoffbehlter, die nicht aus PET hergestellt wurden.
First English Translation: One can buy commercially bottled water in PET containers. Use the expiration date on the containers as a guideline for consumption. Do not use plastic containers that are not made from PET.
Final Refined Translation: You can buy commercially bottled water in PET containers. Use the expiration date on the bottles as a guideline for consumption. Avoid using plastic containers that are not made from PET.

Source: Denken Sie daran, dass die Namen, die so schwer zu finden sind, wirkliche Menschen sind, denen Sie Ihr Dasein in dieser Welt verdanken und denen Sie in der Geisterwelt wieder begegnen werden.
First English Translation: Remember that the names that are so hard to find are real people to whom you owe your existence in this world and whom you will encounter again in the spirit world.
Final Refined Translation: Remember that the names which are so difficult to find belong to real people to whom you owe your existence in this world, and whom you will encounter again in the spirit world.

Source: Wahrscheinlich kennen die Schler bereits den Bericht, wie Enos den ganzen Tag und die ganze Nacht lang betet. Sie knnen ihnen helfen, diese Begebenheit noch besser zu verstehen. Wenn die Schler den Bericht lesen und darber sprechen, knnen sie erkennen, auf welche Weise und mit welcher Einstellung sie ihren Gebeten noch mehr Bedeutung geben knnen. Sie verstehen auch besser, wie sich die Segnungen des Shnopfers auf ihr Leben auswirken.
First English Translation: Probably the students are already familiar with the account of how Enos prays all day and night long. They can help them understand this event even better. When the students read the account and talk about it, they can recognize the ways and attitudes that can give their prayers even more significance. They also better understand how the blessings of the Creator affect their lives.
Final Refined Translation: The students are probably already familiar with the account of Enos praying tirelessly both day and night. They can help them to deepen their understanding of this event. As the students read and discuss the account, they can identify the ways and attitudes that can give their prayers even greater significance. They will also gain a better understanding of how the Creator's blessings affect their lives.

Source: Bei einer Podiumsdiskussion, die er leitete, wies Elder M. Russell Ballard vom Kollegium der Zwlf Apostel darauf hin, dass es sinnvoll sei und man viel lernen knne, wenn man die Anweisungen in den Gemeinderatssitzungen Kapitel fr Kapitel liest und die Grundstze bespricht.
First English Translation: During a panel discussion that he led, Elder M. Russell Ballard of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles pointed out that it is beneficial and one can learn a lot by reading the instructions in the council meetings chapter by chapter and discussing the principles.
Final Refined Translation: In a panel discussion he led, Elder M. Russell Ballard of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles pointed out that it is both sensible and educational to read the instructions for the council meetings chapter by chapter and to discuss the underlying principles.

Source: Elder Oaks zitiert Gordon B. Hinckley 1910-2008, den 15. Prsidenten der Kirche: Wir knnen hflich anderer Meinung sein, ohne unangenehm zu werden.
First English Translation: Elder Oaks quotes Gordon B. Hinckley 1910-2008, the 15th President of the Church: We can politely disagree without being disagreeable.
Final Refined Translation: Elder Oaks quotes Gordon B. Hinckley (1910-2008), the 15th President of the Church, saying: We can respectfully hold differing opinions without becoming disagreeable.

Source: Die erwachsenen Jugendfhrer im Pfahl Hongkong forderten das Jugendkomitee auf, selbst ein Dienstprojekt auszusuchen. Nachdem sich die Jugendlichen erkundigt hatten, was vor Ort dringend gebraucht wurde, beschlossen sie, an einer Schule Kurse fr Kinder aus einkommensschwachen Familien durchzufhren. Etwa 125 Jugendliche erklrten mehr als 80 Schulkindern, wie man seine Talente entwickelt, gesundes Essen kocht, in der Familie Zeit freinander findet und gute Freundschaften aufbaut.
First English Translation: The adult youth leaders in the Hong Kong post urged the youth committee to choose a community service project on their own. After the young people inquired about what was urgently needed on site, they decided to conduct courses at a school for children from low-income families. About 125 youths taught more than 80 schoolchildren how to develop their talents, cook healthy food, find time for each other in the family, and build good friendships.
Final Refined Translation: The adult youth leaders in Hong Kong encouraged the youth committee to independently choose a community service project. After the youths inquired about urgent local needs, they decided to conduct courses at a school for children from low-income families. About 125 young people taught over 80 schoolchildren how to develop their talents, cook healthy meals, make time for family, and build strong friendships.

Source: Eineinhalb Jahrhunderte lang hat das Massaker von Mountain Meadows diejenigen schockiert und bedrckt, die davon erfahren haben. Die Tragdie hat den Angehrigen der Opfer tiefes Leid zugefgt und den Nachkommen der Tter sowie Mitgliedern der Kirche generell das schmerzhafte Gefhl kollektiver Schuld aufgebrdet. Sie hat Kritik an der Kirche ausgelst und schmerzliche und schwierige Fragen aufgeworfen. Wie konnte das geschehen? Wie konnten Mitglieder der Kirche sich an einem solchen Verbrechen beteiligen?
First English Translation: For one and a half centuries, the Mountain Meadows massacre has shocked and disturbed those who learned of it. The tragedy has caused deep grief to the relatives of the victims and imposed the painful feeling of collective guilt on the descendants of the perpetrators as well as on church members in general. It has triggered criticism of the church and raised painful and difficult questions. How could this happen? How could members of the church participate in such a crime?
Final Refined Translation: For one and a half centuries, the Mountain Meadows massacre has shocked and distressed anyone who has learned about it. The tragedy has caused deep sorrow for the victims' families and has imposed a painful feeling of collective guilt on the descendants of the perpetrators as well as on church members in general. It has provoked criticism of the church and raised difficult and painful questions: How could this happen? How could church members participate in such a crime?

Source: Ein Mann, der schon ber 80 war ein Mitglied der Kirche, das sein Geld mit Fahrradreparaturen verdiente und die Fahrrder der Missionare immer kostenlos reparierte , fuhr eines Abends bei strmendem Regen zur Wohnung der Missionare, um zu fragen, ob die Missionare mitkommen und seiner Frau einen Krankensegen geben wrden.
First English Translation: A man who was already over 80 years old, a member of the church, earned his living repairing bicycles and always repaired the missionaries' bikes for free, drove one evening in pouring rain to the missionaries' residence to ask if the missionaries would come and give his wife a blessing for the sick.
Final Refined Translation: An elderly man, who was over 80 years old and a member of the church, earned his living by repairing bicycles, always providing free repairs for the bicycles of the missionaries. One evening, during a heavy rainstorm, he traveled to the missionaries' apartment to inquire whether they could join him to give a blessing to his sick wife.

Final Refined Translation: The love of God and the sincere desire to follow His commandments inspire us to repent.

Final Refined Translation: The program has not been used for several minutes. Would you like to stay logged in?

Source: Wenn man sich bekehrt hat, freut man sich auf den Sonntag, weil es der Sabbat ist. Am Sonntag denkt man nicht: O nein, heute kann ich nicht mit meinen Freunden abhngen oder ins Kino gehen, sondern man denkt: Ich freue mich, dass ich in die Kirche gehen und mich mit Geistigem befassen kann und dass ich Zeit mit meiner Familie verbringen kann.
First English Translation: When one has repented, one looks forward to Sunday because it is the Sabbath. On Sunday, one does not think: Oh no, today I can't hang out with my friends or go to the movies, but one thinks: I am happy that I can go to church and engage with spiritual matters and that I can spend time with my family.
Final Refined Translation: When a person has repented, they eagerly anticipate Sunday, as it is the Sabbath. On Sundays, they do not think, 'Oh no, today I can't hang out with my friends or go to the movies,' but instead, they think, 'I am delighted that I can attend church, engage in spiritual matters, and spend quality time with my family.'

Source: Junge Erwachsene auf der ganzen Welt gehorchen diesem Aufruf zum Dienen, aber es erfordert Glauben und Mut, dem Propheten zu folgen.
First English Translation: Young adults around the world heed this call to serve, but it requires faith and courage to follow the prophet.
Final Refined Translation: Young adults around the world heed this call to serve, but following the prophet requires both faith and courage.

Source: Es kam oft vor, dass ich zu ein, zwei Anzgen, die ein Kunde ausgesucht hatte, eine Auswahl von Hemden und Krawatten zusammenstellte, die ich fr passend hielt. Doch nachdem ich die Hemden und Krawatten vom einen in den anderen Bereich gebracht und neben die Anzge gelegt hatte, war das Ergebnis berraschend: Die Farben nderten sich in dem neuen Licht und passten nun gar nicht zusammen.
First English Translation: It often happened that I assembled a selection of shirts and ties that I considered suitable for one or two suits that a customer had chosen. But after I moved the shirts and ties from one area to another and placed them next to the suits, the result was surprising: The colors changed in the new light and no longer matched at all.
Final Refined Translation: It frequently happened that I would assemble a selection of shirts and ties that I considered suitable for one or two suits chosen by a customer. However, after moving the shirts and ties from one area to another and placing them alongside the suits, the result was surprisingly different: The colors changed under the new lighting and no longer matched at all.

Source: Prsident Joseph Fielding Smith hat gesagt: Man kann zwar behaupten, dass wir nur eine Handvoll sind im Vergleich zur Weltbevlkerung, man kann uns aber auch mit dem Sauerteig vergleichen, der letztlich die ganze Welt durchdringen sollte und von dem der Heiland gesprochen hatte. Wir knnen und werden zu gegebener Zeit gewiss Einfluss auf die ganze Menschheit nehmen. Man wird wissen, wer wir sind und warum es uns gibt. Es mag hoffnungslos erscheinen, es ist eine monumentale Aufgabe, aber es ist nicht nur mglich, sondern auch gewiss, dass wir den Kampf gegen den Satan gewinnen werden.
First English Translation: President Joseph Fielding Smith said: One can certainly claim that we are just a handful compared to the world population, but one can also compare us to the leaven that is ultimately meant to pervade the whole world, of which the Savior spoke. We can and will certainly have an influence on all humanity in due time. People will know who we are and why we exist. It may seem hopeless, it is a monumental task, but it is not only possible, but also certain that we will win the fight against Satan.
Final Refined Translation: President Joseph Fielding Smith stated: Although one might claim that we are just a small number compared to the world population, we can also be compared to leaven that is meant to ultimately permeate the entire world, as the Savior spoke of. We can and will certainly have an influence on all of humanity in due time. People will come to know who we are and why we exist. It may seem hopeless and is indeed a monumental task, but it is not only possible; it is also certain that we will win the battle against Satan.

Source: Vom 11. bis 26. November 2011 finden die Tage der offenen Tr statt auer sonntags.
First English Translation: From November 11 to 26, 2011, the open days will take place, except on Sundays.
Final Refined Translation: The open days will take place from November 11 to 26, 2011, excluding Sundays.

Source: Auch Alessia war berzeugt, dass ihre Beziehung zu einem jungen Mann genau das war, was sie sein sollte. Unsere Geschichte war so wunderschn, dass wir meinten, unsere Beziehung wrde nie enden, auch wenn wir die blichen Schwierigkeiten hatten, die jedes Paar erlebt, erzhlt sie.
First English Translation: Alessia was also convinced that her relationship with a young man was exactly what it should be. Our story was so wonderful that we thought our relationship would never end, even though we had the usual difficulties that every couple experiences, she recounts.
Final Refined Translation: Alessia was equally convinced that her relationship with a young man was exactly what it was meant to be. Our story was so wonderful that we thought our relationship would never end, even though we faced the usual difficulties that every couple experiences, she recounts.

Source: Brder und Schwestern, ist Ihnen klar, was wir haben? Erkennen Sie, welche Stelle wir in diesem groen Drama der Menschheitsgeschichte einnehmen?
First English Translation: Brothers and sisters, do you realize what we have? Do you recognize what position we hold in this great drama of human history?
Final Refined Translation: Brothers and sisters, do you understand what we hold? Are you aware of the part we occupy in this great drama of human history?

Source: Was haben die Propheten und Apostel darber gesagt?
First English Translation: What have the prophets and apostles said about this?
Final Refined Translation: What have the prophets and apostles said about this?

Source: Sie knnen die heiligen Handlungen des Tempels vollziehen lassen, wenn jemand seit zehn Jahren als tot gilt. Diese Regel gilt zum einen fr im Krieg vermisste, auf See verschollene oder fr tot erklrte Personen sowie zum anderen fr Personen, die unter Umstnden verschwunden sind, bei denen der Tod offensichtlich ist, jedoch keine Leiche gefunden wurde.
First English Translation: They can perform the sacred rites of the temple if someone has been considered dead for ten years. This rule applies to those missing in war, those lost at sea, or those declared dead, as well as to individuals who have vanished under circumstances where death is obvious, but no body has been found.
Final Refined Translation: The sacred rites of the temple may be performed if an individual has been deemed dead for a period of ten years. This regulation applies not only to those missing in action during wartime, those lost at sea, or people declared legally dead, but also to those who have gone missing under circumstances that suggest death is evident, yet no remains have been found.

Source: Wenn ein Einreicher Kontaktinformationen hinterlegt hat, knnen Sie diese nutzen, um mit ihm Kontakt aufzunehmen.
First English Translation: If a submitter has provided contact information, you can use it to get in touch with them.
Final Refined Translation: If a submitter has provided their contact information, you can use it to contact them.

Source: Achten Sie darauf, dass eine entspannte Atmosphre herrscht und die Jugendlichen sich miteinander wohl fhlen.

Final Refined Translation: Make sure that a relaxed atmosphere is present and that the young people feel comfortable and at ease with each other.

Final Refined Translation: Dallin H. Oaks engages in discussion with Barbara W. Winder on topics concerning women in the church.

Source: Bitten Sie die Schler, in diesen Versen Wrter oder Ausdrcke zu finden, die aussagen, was das geistige Fortkommen der Menschen behindert hat. Schreiben Sie die Antworten an die Tafel. Veranschaulichen Sie ihnen, dass diese Menschen zwar einmal geglaubt hatten, dass ihre schlechten Handlungen aber dazu fhrten, dass sie ihr Zeugnis vergaen und zur Schlechtigkeit zurckkehrten.
First English Translation: Ask the students to find words or expressions in these verses that state what has hindered the spiritual progress of people. Write the answers on the board. Illustrate to them that these people had once believed, but their bad actions led them to forget their testimony and return to wickedness.
Final Refined Translation: Please ask the students to find words or expressions in these verses that convey what has hindered the spiritual progress of people. Write their responses on the board. Illustrate to them that while these individuals once had faith, their wrongful actions led them to forget their testimony and return to their wicked ways.

Source: Folglich hilft uns der im Shnopfer enthaltene Aspekt, dass wir befhigt werden und Kraft bekommen, auf eine Weise zu sehen, zu handeln und gut zu werden, die wir mit unseren begrenzten irdischen Fhigkeiten nie erfassen oder erreichen knnten. Ich bezeuge, dass im Shnopfer des Erlsers wirklich eine Macht steckt, die uns Fhigkeiten verleiht. Ohne diese Macht aus dem Shnopfer, die mir Kraft gibt, knnte ich heute Morgen nicht vor Ihnen stehen.
First English Translation: Consequently, the aspect contained in the Atonement helps us to be empowered and to gain strength to see, act, and become good in a way that we could never comprehend or achieve with our limited earthly abilities. I bear witness that there is indeed a power in the Atonement of the Savior that grants us abilities. Without this power from the Atonement, which gives me strength, I could not stand before you this morning.
Final Refined Translation: Consequently, the aspect contained within the Atonement allows us to be empowered and to gain strength to see, act, and improve in ways that we could never fully comprehend or achieve with our limited earthly abilities. I bear witness that there is indeed a power in the Savior's Atonement that grants us capabilities. Without this power from the Atonement, which gives me strength, I would not be able to stand before you this morning.

Source: Whrend meiner Kindheit und frhen Jugend wurde ich hin- und hergereicht. Ich erlebte nie, wie es war, eine Familie zu haben, und bekam auch niemals ein Geschenk, nicht einmal zum Geburtstag oder zu Weihnachten.
First English Translation: During my childhood and early youth, I was shuffled back and forth. I never experienced what it was like to have a family, and I never received a gift, not even for my birthday or Christmas.
Final Refined Translation: During my childhood and early adolescence, I was shuffled between different homes. I never experienced what it was like to have a family, and I never received a gift—not even for my birthday or Christmas.

Source: Asenaca hat, obwohl sie erst 19 ist, in ihrem Leben schon viel Kummer erlebt. Dennoch strahlt sie Freude aus. Sie freut sich an der Gewissheit, dass sie zu einer ewigen Familie gehrt, denn ihre Familie wurde 2001 im Suva-Tempel gesiegelt, und sie freut sich an der Gewissheit, dass der himmlische Vater sie kennt und liebt.
First English Translation: Asenaca has already experienced a lot of sorrow in her life, even though she is only 19. Nevertheless, she radiates joy. She rejoices in the certainty that she belongs to an eternal family, as her family was sealed in the Suva Temple in 2001, and she finds joy in the assurance that Heavenly Father knows and loves her.
Final Refined Translation: Although Asenaca is only 19 years old, she has already faced much sorrow in her life. Yet, she radiates joy. She delights in the assurance that she belongs to an eternal family, as her family was sealed in the Suva Temple in 2001, and she finds comfort in knowing that Heavenly Father knows and loves her.

Source: Wir weisen warnend darauf hin, dass jemand, der die Bndnisse der Keuschheit verletzt, der seinen Ehepartner oder seine Nachkommen misshandelt oder missbraucht oder seinen familiren Verpflichtungen nicht nachkommt, eines Tages vor Gott Rechenschaft ablegen muss. Weiter warnen wir davor, dass der Zerfall der Familie ber die Menschen, Lnder und Vlker das Unheil bringen wird, das in alter und neuer Zeit von den Propheten vorhergesagt worden ist.
First English Translation: We warn that anyone who violates the bonds of chastity, who mistreats or abuses their spouse or offspring, or who fails to fulfill their family obligations, will one day have to account before God. Furthermore, we warn that the disintegration of the family will bring calamity upon people, countries, and nations, as has been foretold by the prophets in ancient and modern times.
Final Refined Translation: We hereby issue a solemn warning that those who violate the bonds of chastity, mistreat or abuse their spouses or descendants, or fail to fulfill their family responsibilities, will one day have to account for their actions before God. Furthermore, we caution that the disintegration of the family will bring calamity upon individuals, nations, and peoples, as has been foretold by both ancient and contemporary prophets.

Final Refined Translation: In our later conversations, the missionaries told me about the wonderful gospel of restoration. This gospel filled me with hope and renewed enthusiasm for life. A few weeks after the missionaries knocked on my door, I decided to be baptized.

Source: Der Herr mchte, dass ihr, meine jungen Freunde, von ganzem Herzen bestrebt seid, nach diesen Mastben und nach der Wahrheit in den heiligen Schriften zu leben. Wenn ihr dies tut, werdet ihr ber den Augenblick hinausschauen, und ihr werdet eine strahlend schne Zukunft vor euch sehen, die groe Chancen und Aufgaben fr euch bereithlt. Ihr werdet bereit seid, euch anzustrengen und lange durchzuhalten, und ihr werdet eine optimistische Lebensauffassung haben.
First English Translation: The Lord wants you, my young friends, to sincerely strive to live according to these standards and according to the truth in the holy scriptures. If you do this, you will look beyond the moment, and you will see a brilliantly beautiful future ahead of you, filled with great opportunities and challenges awaiting you. You will be prepared to exert yourselves and persist for a long time, and you will have an optimistic outlook on life.
Final Refined Translation: The Lord desires that you, my young friends, earnestly strive to wholeheartedly live by these standards and the truths contained within the holy scriptures. If you do this, you will look beyond the present moment and envision a radiant and beautiful future ahead of you, one filled with great opportunities and challenges. You will be prepared to put in the effort and persevere through difficult times, maintaining an optimistic outlook on life.

Source: Wie damals, als ich in Frankreich angekommen war, suchte ich Trost im Gebet, im Schriftstudium und durch den Heiligen Geist. Dadurch wurde mir viel deutlicher bewusst, welchen Trost uns der Heilige Geist und die Lehre, dass die Familie ewigen Bestand hat, bringen und dass das Shnopfer Jesu Christi sich wirklich auf unser Leben auswirkt, erzhlt sie.
First English Translation: Like back then, when I had arrived in France, I sought comfort in prayer, in studying scriptures, and through the Holy Spirit. This made me much more aware of the comfort that the Holy Spirit brings us, and the teaching that the family has eternal permanence, and that the sacrifice of Jesus Christ really affects our lives, it tells.
Final Refined Translation: Just as when I arrived in France back then, I sought comfort in prayer, scripture study, and through the Holy Spirit. This experience made me vividly aware of the consolation that the Holy Spirit offers us, as well as the doctrine that families are eternal. It underscored the truth that the sacrifice of Jesus Christ truly affects our lives.

Source: Das tat gut, weil wir keine Verwandten in der Nhe haben. Aber unsere Gemeindefamilie war fr uns da, erzhlt Bruder Godfrey, der dabei ein paar Trnen unterdrckt.
First English Translation: That felt good because we have no relatives nearby. But our community family was there for us, Brother Godfrey says, while suppressing a few tears.
Final Refined Translation: That was comforting because we have no relatives nearby. Still, our community family was there for us, Brother Godfrey recounts, as he struggles to hold back a few tears.
